mapper.insert: insert into tbl_nucleic(resident_id, result, time) values (#{resident_id}, #{result}, #{time})
mapper.select: select r.id, r.idCard, r.name, r.age, r.gender, r.address, r.phone, n.result, n.time from tbl_resident r left join tbl_nucleic n on n.resident_id = r.id where n.result = '阳性'
